text: Ju Jeong-hyeon (, also transliterated Joo Jung-hyun, born 31 August 1974) is a South Korean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for South Korea Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for South Korea Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games
title: Ju Jeong-hyeon
